alert.note: Alert for Lower Yukon Valley (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 01 at 4:53AM AKDT until November 02 at 4:00PM AKDT by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 7 PM THIS EVENING TO 4 PM AKDT WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of up to 4 inches. Winds gusting as high as 55 mph. * WHERE...Lower Yukon Valley south of Anvik. * WHEN...From 7 PM this evening to 4 PM AKDT Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches. The cold wind chills as low as 20 below zero could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Near Blizzard conditions will reduce visibility to less than one half mile at times.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.
